fields.name: Milk Bottles
fields.detail: Milk Bottles are renowned around the nation!

fields.name: Kola Cubes
fields.detail: Tasty cola flavoured, traditional hard boiled sweets. You cant go wrong with these... having been featured in corners shops since the 50's they are a true retro British sweet!

fields.name: Lemon Sherberts
fields.detail: An old-fashioned classic of the sweet world. These hard boiled Sherbet Lemons have a mouth-watering citrus flavour to make your tongue tingle!

fields.name: Haribo Bears 1KG tub
fields.detail: Haribo bears renowned for there chewy fruity flavour come and buy today!

fields.name: Strawbs
fields.detail: Giant in size and flavour, the Haribo Giant Strawbs are delicious gummy sweets, bursting with sweet strawberry flavour. One of Haribo's most popular pick n mix treats, these soft chewy sweets are loved by all. Packed in a generous tub with approximately 100 pieces, they are perfect for your home sweet stash as well as an easy candy buffet choice!

fields.name: Blue Fizzy Raspberry Bottles
fields.detail: These fizzy little bottles will burst on your tongue!!

fields.name: Shrimp
fields.detail: Who doesn't love the iconic pick n mix pink shrimp? Super popular with all ages these retro Strawberry flavour and now available in mini size!

fields.name: Foamy Bananas
fields.detail: The iconic foam bananas are now available in mini size! These delicious foam sweets are one of our best sellers and a top choice for pick and mix pouchs!

fields.name: Jelly Babys
fields.detail: The iconic Jelly Baby, could this be the most popular sweet? These colourful fruit flavoured jelly sweets feature a fine covering of sugar dusting to help them from sticking together!

fields.name: Flying Saucers
fields.detail: These Outer Dimentional rice paper flying suacers with fizzy sherbert filling

fields.name: Strawberry Pencils
fields.detail: A strawberry chewy pencil filled with fondant.

fields.name: Sour Strawberry Bites
fields.detail: A strawberry chewy pencil filled with fondant Covered in Sour Sugar.

fields.name: Fried Eggs
fields.detail: A classic haribo sweet.  Gummy sweets shaped like little fried eggs – white on the outside and yellow in the middle.

fields.name: Dolly Mixtures
fields.detail: An iconic sweet loved by both adults and children alike.  Made up of various shapes and flavours – these pretty little sweets have been around for over 100 years!

fields.name: Liquorice Allsorts
fields.detail: A delicious mix of all your liquorice favourites.

fields.name: Jelly Buttons (aka Spoggs)
fields.detail: Blue & pink coloured aniseed flavoured chewy sweets.  These are the sweets from the Liquorice Allsorts that you either love or hate.  Personally I love them!!

fields.name: Strawberry Laces
fields.detail: The classic Strawberry laces shouldnt be missed! Are you a lady and the dog eater or a screw in a ball?

fields.name: Fizzy Strawberry Laces
fields.detail: The standard Strawberry Lace just got WILD how sour can you go?

fields.name: Cola Bottles
fields.detail: The high street classic jelly based Coca Cola flavoured bottles.

fields.name: Fudge
fields.detail: Standard Clotted Cream Fudge chunks for the real sweet tooth among us!

fields.name: Dib Dab
fields.detail: The Dib Dab the lick it and roll it high street classic get your Dib on!

fields.name: Candy Sticks
fields.detail: The classic stick of pure sugar for those who love the harder sweet candy!
